events.name: West Ham United at Aston Villa

headlines.description: West Ham United earned their first win of the Premier League season as a deflected shot by Pablo Fornals sealed a 1-0 victory at Aston Villa.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham earn first PL win of season with Fornals winner at Aston Villa

headlines.description: Allan Saint-Maximin struck a thunderous volley in the final minute to rescue a point for Newcastle United in a 1-1 draw at Wolves on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saint-Maximin snatches late point for Newcastle at Wolves

headlines.description: Harry Kane scored his third and fourth goals of the season as he led Tottenham to a 2-0 win over Nottingham Forest at City Ground on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kane goals lead Tottenham to 2-0 victory
